content: He was also instructed in music by Linus the centaur (centaurs were horses with a man's head); however, he devoted himself with less interest to this art.
translations: ita:Fu anche istruito alla musica da Linus il centauro (i centauri erano cavalli con la testa d'uomo); tuttavia, si dedic√≤ c
